message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.MM

The paper proposes a novel approach for worker activity recognition using multiple modalities, including visual camera and smart armband. The use of visual camera suggests computer vision (cs.CV) as a likely sub-category. The focus on human-centered intelligent manufacturing and worker activity recognition suggests human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as another likely sub-category. The use of convolutional neural networks for feature learning suggests machine learning (cs.LG) as a possible sub-category. The use of probability distributions and fusion of modalities suggests information retrieval (cs.IR) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the use of multiple modalities, including video, suggests multimedia (cs.MM) as a possible sub-category.
